projects.title: Human in the loop optimzation of squatting assitance
projects.description: Generating the best squatting assistance using ankle-exoskeleton using Human in the loop optimziation.

projects.title: Foot contact forces can be used to personalize a wearable robot during human walking
projects.description: Using the pressure symmetry and foot force intergral to personalize a prothesis during human walking.

projects.title: Phase-plane based model-free estimation of steady-state metabolic cost
projects.description: Estimating the metabolic cost using non-linear and data driven methods. Using Gaussian mixture model and Phase plane representation of metabolic cost.

projects.title: Reinformement learning in higher dimensions
projects.description: Developing a Reinforcement learning framework to learn locomotion in COM domain for both tradition control achitectures and reinforcement learning methods. This will applied on quadruped robots.
